amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to ensure that the annual evaluations include changes based on informed findings by employers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 116-302 to ensure that the annual evaluations include changes based on informed findings by employers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garcia (TX) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
